userEmail.blank: Please enter your username or email.

password.atLeastChar: Password must be at least 8 characters.
password.atLeastLower: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter.
password.atLeastUpper: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter.
password.atLeastDigit: Password must contain at least one digit.
